value.excerpt: Best-of-7 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Rogue (Zerg) and Classic (Protoss). This series is the Grand Finals of the OlimoLeague Invitational 9, and all games take place on old maps that were mostly played in Wings of Liberty and Heart of the Swarm. value.title: StarCraft 2: Serral MASSES ULTRALISKS vs Zest?! (Zerg vs Protoss)
value.excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2 between Serral and Zest. In this match Zest opens up with what looks like a standard turtle Sky Toss style. However, as he transitions towards a lot of Gateways, Serral is forced to respond and decides to go for Ultralisks. Ultras versus Protoss are incredibly uncommon.
